name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>44313823

> [[ UI Messenger – Crimson Guardian Liza ]]
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Feels good. Like I'm a part of something.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Nice to know I've made my mark, even if someone manages to off me.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: You'll find that NPCs will open up a bit.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: You're sort of like, their landlord.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: So you're in charge but they won't exactly bend over for you.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Does it mean anything if some of them act... ambitious?
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: That's up to you to decide.

You score an additional 140 credits for the armor scraps and spare buckler, bringing your total balance to 319.

“Could you make a weapon that's too large, by any right, for me to use?” You ask. “Just curious. I might need one in the future.”

“Underestimating my skill is your specialty, Keeper.” The forgemaster responds, its form releasing something of a sigh. “As is loitering.”

"Oh, fine."

[[ 1 ]]
> Send someone a message. (Write-in.)
> Opt out.

[[ 2 ]]
> Check out the Celestial Altar.
> Head to the “test chamber”.
> Head to the overworld simulation.
